format_current_song.label: Current Song Message
format_current_song.tooltip: The message the bot will when a new song starts playing. Available formatting: {{title}}, {{channel}} and {{requester}}

youtube_data_api_url.label: Youtube Data API URI
youtube_data_api_url.tooltip: The URL for the Youtube Data API.

youtube_data_api_key.label: Youtube Data API v3 Key
youtube_data_api_key.tooltip: A key to access the Youtube Data API v3 for video information requests.

warn_non_creative_commons.label: Warn for Non-Creative Commons
warn_non_creative_commons.tooltip: Will display a warning in chat if a Youtube video that doesn't have the Creative Commons license is requested or is being played.

format_non_cc_requested.value: WARNING! The song just requested by {{requester}} is probably copyright.
format_non_cc_requested.label: Non-Creative Commons Request Warning Message
format_non_cc_requested.tooltip: The warning message that will be displayed if a requested song doesn't have the Creative Commons license. Available formatting: {{title}}, {{channel}} and {{requester}}

format_non_cc_playing.value: WARNING! The currently playing song is probably copyright.
format_non_cc_playing.label: Non-Creative Commons Playing Warning Message
format_non_cc_playing.tooltip: The warning message that will be displayed if the currently playing song doesn't have the Creative Commons license and isn't excluded. Available formatting: {{title}}, {{channel}} and {{requester}}

title_term_override.label: Override if Term(s) in Title
title_term_override.tooltip: If enabled, when one of the terms configured in the override_terms.txt file is present in the title, a warning will not be displayed for non-Creative Commons.

desc_term_override.label: Override if Term(s) in Description
desc_term_override.tooltip: If enabled, when one of the terms configured in the override_terms.txt file is present in the description, a warning will not be displayed for non-Creative Commons.

tags_term_override.label: Override if Term(s) in Tags
tags_term_override.tooltip: If enabled, when one of the terms configured in the override_terms.txt file is present in the tags, a warning will not be displayed for non-Creative Commons.
